name: Word Game Free
description:
Word Game is a very popular Word Formation game played all around the world.

Word Game starts easy but challenges you as you play more levels. All of the levels can be completed, it just matters if you really have the vocabulary to do so.

By forming different words in Word Game, you score points depending on the
difficulty of the word created.

The main objective of Word Game is to form more and more words as quickly as
possible.

Be careful, as wrong words will deduct your points!

Play Word Game for Free today!!!

Features
Designed for both Tablet and Phone 
2 Different Game Modes 
30 Different Levels 
Completely Free to Play
Beautiful Graphics and User Experience
